snippet: State Department officials will come to Minnesota on Tuesday to hold the only public meeting on a draft environmental review for the final segment of Enbridge Energy's project to boost the capacity of its Alberta Clipper pipeline....

headline.main: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'
headline.print_headline: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'

lead_paragraph: State Department officials will come to Minnesota on Tuesday to hold the only public meeting on a draft environmental review for the final segment of Enbridge Energy's project to boost the capacity of its Alberta Clipper pipeline.
